channel.title: How do i change the client ip?
channel.description:
Hey, It's been a long time since hosted a server. I was wondering if someone could help me. I want to change the Client IP to my no-ip for my friends to play it. But i have forgotten how to. Could someone help me with what file i put the IP in and what do i search for in the file. Many Thanks
BladeKO

item.title: How do i change the client ip?
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

PI: Go to client.java and search for ‘server =’ than after server = must stay a ip change that1 to your no-ip.
DELTA: Go to gui.java and search for ‘serverip =’ than after serverip = must stay a ip change that1 to your no-ip

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the client ip?
